hooks.command: if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" == *.py ]]; then black --check "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || black "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; ruff check --fix "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; fi

if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" == *.ts ]] || [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" == *.tsx ]]; then cd web && npx prettier --write "../$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; npx eslint --fix "../$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; fi

hooks.prompt: Before finishing, verify: 1) docs/SESSION.md updated if significant work done, 2) docs/DECISIONS.md updated if architectural decisions made, 3) docs/FEATURES.md status updated if features completed. Return: APPROVED or list missing updates.
